entry.title: CELTIC RESPOND TO ISRAELI BOSS SLUR
entry.summary: CELTIC have responded to outrageous slur from Israel boss Alon Hazan that the club’s fans are “known to be anti-Semitic”. entry.title: ‘WE MAKE A GOOD PARTNERSHIP,’ OH REVEALS KYOGO AMBITION
entry.summary: SOUTH KOREAN frontman Oh Hyeon-gyu has revealed his Celtic target. The powerhouse striker, the champions’ matchwinner in the 2-1 victory over St Mirren in midweek, wants to team up with Kyogo Furuhashi – in EVERY game. Oh has admitted his admiration for his colleague who has scored 61 goals for the Hoops since his £4.6million [...]

entry.title: IMAGES: KYOG-OH

entry.title: Holm, Yang, Maeda determined outcome
entry.summary: For reasons that are not clear to me, St Mirren are a proper football team. They benefited from a central defensive lapse to take an early lead and limited Celtic large spells of unproductive possession. Then, after going behind, finished the game playing some of the best football we have seen from a Scottish opponent [...]
